page.shortlink: api a5 prompt files in db function
page.description: Prompts the user to select files in the current Database

argument.name: File_List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of selected files.

argument.name: input_list
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of the default file selection list.

page.discussion: The A5_PROMPT_FILES_IN_DB() function displays the Files to Zip dialog and returns a list of database and web publishing files from the current database.
